**What happened**:
kubectl top pod need a flag --sort.
now:
```
admindeMacBook-Pro:kubectl admin$ kubectl --kubeconfig=kubectl.kubeconfig top pod
NAME                                                           CPU(cores)   MEMORY(bytes)   
cauth-v0.0.5-2463911897-165m8                                  34m          10Mi            
hadoop-journalnode-2                                           13m          362Mi           
kubernetes-admin-mongo-v3.0.5-fix-permission-742023179-kgqdg   5m           44Mi            
hodor-v0.0.5-3204531036-fqb0q                                  23m          64Mi            
test-1440672787-kvx8h                                          0m           1Mi
elasticsearch-logging-v1-psc43                                 2m           2406Mi   
```

**What you expected to happen**:
--sort=memory:
```
admindeMacBook-Pro:kubectl admin$ kubectl --kubeconfig=kubectl.kubeconfig top pod --sort=memory
NAME                                                           CPU(cores)   MEMORY(bytes)   
elasticsearch-logging-v1-psc43                                 2m           2406Mi   
hadoop-journalnode-2                                           13m          362Mi     
hodor-v0.0.5-3204531036-fqb0q                                  23m          64Mi          
kubernetes-admin-mongo-v3.0.5-fix-permission-742023179-kgqdg   5m           44Mi            
cauth-v0.0.5-2463911897-165m8                                  34m          10Mi                
test-1440672787-kvx8h                                          0m           1Mi
```
--sort=cpu:
```
admindeMacBook-Pro:kubectl admin$ kubectl --kubeconfig=kubectl.kubeconfig top pod --sort=cpu
NAME                                                           CPU(cores)   MEMORY(bytes)   
cauth-v0.0.5-2463911897-165m8                                  34m          10Mi     
hodor-v0.0.5-3204531036-fqb0q                                  23m          64Mi         
hadoop-journalnode-2                                           13m          362Mi     
kubernetes-admin-mongo-v3.0.5-fix-permission-742023179-kgqdg   5m           44Mi      
elasticsearch-logging-v1-psc43                                 2m           2406Mi              
test-1440672787-kvx8h                                          0m           1Mi
```
